name: Lu Qingxian
quote: Between black and white, I choose the gray zone
description: The mediator who stays calm in disputes
bio: Once a core member of a human organization, he saw through the hypocrisy behind black-and-white principles and chose to leave. Moved by ESAP's philosophy that 'even artificial light can guide the way,' he became the bridge between the team and the outside world.
